reviewText:
I bought the VHS and then finally found it on DVD....folks if you are lucky enough to find it on DVD.....don't wait until you say you have the money to get it.

You won't see this DVD very often for sale. It's a bonus when you buy the set from living scriptures. May time you will see the sets for sale on here or Ebay without this DVD.

Loved this movie!!! Buy it now.
